The TAXUS ATLAS study [ 4 ] compared outcomes with Taxus Liberte to historical controls treated with Taxus Express and showed similar outcomes .The 2nd generation DES , the Xience V Everolimus - eluting stent ( EES ) ( Abbot Vascular , Santa Clara , CA , USA ) consists of the multilink vision cobalt chromium platform with a nonerodible polymer and everolimus , a synthetic derivative of Sirolimus .
